aiUpscaler_subtitle: Increase the resolution and detail of your images
aiUpscaler_uploaderDescription: Click the frame to upload an image you want to sharpen and enhance
aiUpscaler_notesPlaceholder: e.g., preserve wood grain texture, enhance eye details...
aiUpscaler_regenDescription: Add notes to improve the upscaled image
aiUpscaler_regenPlaceholder: e.g., make the hair look softer...
